IUCN Red List (Species Assessed for Global Conservation)

dataObjects.subject: http://rs.tdwg.org/ontology/voc/SPMInfoItems#GeneralDescription
dataObjects.title: Biology
dataObjects.description: Occurs in the open water; observed over rocks as well as over open sand; and feeds on fish (Ref. 5595).

dataObjects.bibliographicCitation: Kazembe, J. & Makocho, P. 2006. Champsochromis caeruleus. In: IUCN 2014 . IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. Version 2014.1 . <www.iucnredlist.org>
dataObjects.description:
Red List Category
LC
Least Concern

Red List Criteria

Version
3.1

Year Assessed
2006

Assessor/s
Kazembe, J. & Makocho, P.

Reviewer/s
Snoeks, J. (Freshwater Fish Red List Authority) & Darwall, W. (Freshwater Biodiversity Assessment Programme)

Contributor/s

Justification
Endemic to Lake Malawi, the Upper Shire and Lake Malombe. No recorded widespread decline although the population has declined sharply in Lake Malombe.
